title: 6.4 Master Challenge 2
question:
Prepare a worksheet in Excel to auto generate the table of a number mentioned in cell E1.

Note: Formulas are marked in red and the validations to be applied in cell E1 are highlighted in the Data Validation window.

Result:
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
